TopicTitle: GOG galaxy not launching- trying to install DLC making history on mac

Articles.Content:
Hi people,

New here. My son is obsessed with kerbal, we bought the dlc add Making history from gog. We can not get gog gallaxy to launch on our mac running 10.14.5 late 2015 mac. We have all the files downloaded and was wondering if you can instal them yourself instead of going through Gog gallaxy. Can anyone please help us out?  I have read the osx installer like bellow but for the life of me can not figure it out. 

My son is going mad as we have been trying to install for days now with no luck, Gog have emailed me back several times but with no outcome. We have re installed gog gallaxy launcher over and over.  

Any advice on mac would be awesome. 

Bellow.

Contents? the whole folder?  Cant find KSP installation directory? help

then running the script? any advice on that?

Thanks for looking I am getting desperate now as my kid id going mad for it. 

 

OSX Installer:
* Uncompress the file provided
* Place the contents of the file in your KSP installation directory
* Run the script called dlc-mhe-[lang].command

Regards Gabriel

Try launching the game directly.

You don't have to use GOG Galaxy to launch any game sold on GOG.  They specifically don't lock their games to the launcher.
